MergeConfirmCloseDialogMsg: Do you want to close the Merge command dialog?
MergeAlertUnsupportedDataDlgMsg: Unsupported data for merge detected in structures involved. Merge will need to close.
MergeAlertUnsupportedDataNotifMsg: Unsupported data for merge detected in structures involved. Merge has been disabled.
NRFConfirmCloseDialogMsg: Do you want to close the New Revision From command dialog?
ReviseTargetTakeSource: Revise target and take source content
OverwriteTarget: Overwrite target and take source content
TooltipShortSelActionRevise: Creates a revision of the object in the reference structure, using the content of the corresponding object in the source structure. This new revision is inserted in the resulting structure.
TooltipShortSelActionReuse: Inserts the object present in the source structure in the resulting structure.
TooltipShortSelActionReuseRef: Inserts the object present in the reference structure in the resulting structure.
TooltipShortSelActionExclude: Does not insert the object in the resulting structure.
TooltipShortSelActionInsertNew: Creates a branch of the child object present in the source structure. This new branch is inserted in the resulting structure.
TooltipShortSelActionReviseTarget: In the resultant structure, the object in the Target structure will be revised and keeping its current content.
TooltipShortSelActionReviseTargetTakeSou: In the resultant structure, the object in the Target structure will be revised taking the current content of the matched object in the Source structure.
TooltipShortSelActionOverwriteTarget: In the resultant structure, the object in the Target structure will be overwritten taking the current content of the matched object in the Source structure.
TooltipShortSelActionDeleteTarget: In the resultant structure, the object in the Target structure will removed.
TooltipShortSelActionIgnoreSource: In the resultant structure, the object in the Source structure will not be added.
TooltipShortSelActionKeepTarget: In the resultant structure, the object in the Target structure will be kept, keeping its current content.
TooltipShortSelActionKeepSource: In the resultant structure, the object in the Source structure will be kept, keeping its current content.
TooltipShortSelActionAddInstToTarget: In the resultant structure, the object in the Source structure will branched and added.
TooltipShortActionMulti: Change action to {actionName} for selected objects.
ActionFilterTooltip: Hides or shows the objects displayed in the structures according to the action assigned to them.
ActionFilterItemTooltip: Select to show objects with this action selected.
ActionFilterItemActionNameTooltip: Toggle visibility of objects with action {actionName} selected.
ReapplyCurrentFilterTooltip: Refresh objects to hide or show in the structures based on current filter and actions assigned.
ContentFromReference: Content taken from the object in the reference structure
ContentFromTarget: Content taken from the object in the target structure
ContentFromSource: Content taken from the object in the source structure
ContentFromNRFReferenceTooltipShort: In the created revision, content will be taken from the object in the reference structure.
ContentFromNRFSourceTooltipShort: In the created revision, content will be taken from the object in the source structure.
ContentFromMergeTargetTooltipShort: In the merged object, content will be taken from the object in the target structure.
ContentFromMergeSourceTooltipShort: In the merged object, content will be taken from the object in the source structure.
